DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample urine laboratory woman breast cancer may help doctor learn whether tamoxifen aromatase inhibitor alter metabolism estrogen . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study effect tamoxifen aromatase inhibitor estrogen metabolism woman undergo treatment newly diagnose breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tamoxifen Aromatase Inhibitor Estrogen Metabolism Women Undergoing Treatment Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Learn effect select chemotherapy agent profile estrogen metabolite , glutathione conjugate , depurinating DNA adduct urine woman breast cancer . - Determine whether tamoxifen citrate aromatase inhibitor alters metabolism estrogens . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord plan therapy ( tamoxifen citrate v aromatase inhibitor ) . Patients receive tamoxifen citrate aromatase inhibitor plan . Urine sample ( nipple aspirate fluid , possible ) collect begin treatment 2-6 month treatment . Samples analyze 40 estrogen metabolite , conjugate , depurinating DNA adduct ultraperformance liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometric detection . Patients ' information , include race , body mass index , age menarche , menopausal status , age menopause applicable , smoke history , alcohol consumption , pregnancy history include age pregnancy , lactation , history benign breast disease , hysterectomy , disease type , collect medical record review .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Newly diagnose ductal carcinoma situ invasive breast cancer Scheduled receive tamoxifen citrate aromatase inhibitor Estrogen receptor progesterone receptor positive PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 Not pregnant nursing PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No prior antiestrogen drug tamoxifen citrate raloxifene No concurrent estrogen
